# Challenge #4
## English
Decode a given binary stream. Here's the packet specification:
```
%%     8        32      ?
%% |  type | length | data |
%% 
%% | hello = 0 | length | name | pass |
%% | name = 1  | length | string      |
%% | pass = 2  | length | string      |
%% | ack = 3   | length | message (opt) |
%% | ping = 4  | length | time (int) |
%% | pong = 5  | length | time (int) |

%% Examples
%%
%% type hello --> name's data: "cs" and pass' data: "games"
00000000000000000000000000000000000100010000000100000000000000000000000000000010011000110111001100000010000000000000000000000000000001010110011101100001011011010110010101110011

%%
%% type name --> data: "name"
000000010000000000000000000000000000010001101110011000010110110101100101

%%
%% type pass --> data: "pass"
000000100000000000000000000000000000010001110000011000010111001101110011

%%
%% type ack --> without msg
0000001100000000000000000000000000000000

%%
%% type ack --> data: "message"
00000011000000000000000000000000000010000110111101110000011101000110100101101111011011100110000101101100

%%
%% type ping --> data: 2018
000001000000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000011111100010

%%
%% type pong --> data: 42
000001010000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000000000101010
```

## Français
Décodez un flux binaire qui sera donné en entré. La spécification du packet est comme suit:
```
%%     8        32      ?
%% |  type | length | data |
%% 
%% | hello = 0 | length | name | pass |
%% | name = 1  | length | string      |
%% | pass = 2  | length | string      |
%% | ack = 3   | length | message (opt) |
%% | ping = 4  | length | time (int) |
%% | pong = 5  | length | time (int) |

%% Examples
%%
%% type hello --> name's data: "cs" and pass' data: "games"
00000000000000000000000000000000000100010000000100000000000000000000000000000010011000110111001100000010000000000000000000000000000001010110011101100001011011010110010101110011

%%
%% type name --> data: "name"
000000010000000000000000000000000000010001101110011000010110110101100101

%%
%% type pass --> data: "pass"
000000100000000000000000000000000000010001110000011000010111001101110011

%%
%% type ack --> without msg
0000001100000000000000000000000000000000

%%
%% type ack --> data: "message"
00000011000000000000000000000000000010000110111101110000011101000110100101101111011011100110000101101100

%%
%% type ping --> data: 2018
000001000000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000011111100010

%%
%% type pong --> data: 42
000001010000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000000000101010
```
